dataset.name: products
dataset.description: Realistic 100-product dataset for Kenakata e-commerce project. Placeholders used for images (placehold.co) with dynamic background & text colors.

message.note: This dataset uses placeholder images (placehold.co). Replace thumbnail/images with real assets when ready.
message.usage: Place this file in public/data/products.json and fetch or import in development. Prices are in BDT.
